IHBT Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 20 Project Associate and Other Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 16, 2025, 17:19 IST
 Institute of Himalayan Bio resource Technology
 20 Jobs |  Posted On : 16-Aug-2025 |  Himachal Pradesh |  Salary : 20,000 to 31,000




FOLLOW

Institute of Himalayan Bioresource Technology (IHBT) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 20 Project Associates and Project Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc, B.Sc, and M.Pharm can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, and salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the IHBT Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview at the address given below.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Himachal Pradesh.

IHBT Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Project Associate 	15	M.Sc, M.Pharm
Project Assistant	05	B.Sc

Age Limit for the IHBT Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the IHBT Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the IHBT Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 20,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 31,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the IHBT Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the IHBT Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Project Associate Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, attend the interview at the address given below.

Venue

CSIR-IHBT, Palampur (H.P.)

Important Dates

Last Date of Interview	21-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
